# Writing a Paper in R

This is a very exciting workshop! You will use the skills that you've learned from the past two workshops to create a fully reproducible paper in R.

The format of this is workshop is a bit different than others, in that it will primarily be a lecture.

Please follow along with the attached PDF!

```{r download-workshop-three-handout-pdf, echo=F}
xfun::embed_file('workshop-materials/workshop-3-handout-paper-writing.pdf')
```

And here is the link to the GitHub template: [https://github.com/christelinda-laureijs/sample-thesis](https://github.com/christelinda-laureijs/sample-thesis)
